anatel_mobile_accesses.name: Anatel Mobile Phone Accesses
anatel_mobile_accesses.description: Mobile phone accesses by technology (5G, 4G, 3G) and region. Essential for time-series visualizations.
anatel_mobile_accesses.preprocessing_notes: Aggregate by state for maps. Group by technology for time-series. Handle regional granularity.

anatel_broadband_penetration.name: Anatel Fixed Broadband Penetration
anatel_broadband_penetration.description: Fixed broadband connections by speed tier and municipality. Perfect for penetration maps.
anatel_broadband_penetration.preprocessing_notes: Aggregate by municipality/state. Calculate penetration rates (connections/population).

internet_aberta_forecast.name: Data Traffic Demand Forecast for Brazil
internet_aberta_forecast.description: Long-term projections (2024-2033) on data traffic, 5G adoption, and broadband growth. Ideal for forecast visualizations.
internet_aberta_forecast.preprocessing_notes: Extract tables from PDF. Convert to time-series format. Handle forecast uncertainties.

zenodo_broadband_customers.name: Real Dataset from Broadband Customers Brazil
zenodo_broadband_customers.description: Real Brazilian operator data with customer metrics (latency, jitter, packet loss). Great for performance dashboards.
zenodo_broadband_customers.preprocessing_notes: Add temporal indexing. Create performance metrics. Aggregate by region.

teleco_mobile_statistics.name: Teleco Mobile Statistics Brazil
teleco_mobile_statistics.description: Mobile statistics and trends from Teleco. Historical data and current metrics.
teleco_mobile_statistics.preprocessing_notes: Web scraping required. Extract tables. Normalize formats.

net_data_directory_brazil.name: Net Data Directory Brazil Telecom
net_data_directory_brazil.description: Network data directory with Brazilian telecom infrastructure metrics.

brazil_states_geojson.name: Brazil States GeoJSON
brazil_states_geojson.description: GeoJSON file for Brazilian states. Essential for D3.js maps.

brazil_states_topojson.name: Brazil States TopoJSON
brazil_states_topojson.description: TopoJSON for efficient map rendering. Smaller file size than GeoJSON.
